name: The Lord of The Rings The Battle For Middle-Earth
description: Please be sure to install the game in English when prompted. After the initial installer finishes do not run the game, the patches and HD Edition need the game closed to run install properly.
notes:
The resolution in: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Application Data/My Battle for Middle-earth Files/Options.ini needs to be set manually. For example the Resolution line should be set as follows:
Resolution = 1920 1080
content:
files:
- patch103:
    filename: patch103.exe
    referer: https://duckduckgo.com
    url: https://www.moddb.com/downloads/mirror/35515/114/8bbf8b446714cd14972d743587497db8/
- patch106:
    filename: patch106AIO.exe
    url: http://server.cnc-online.net/downloads/patch/T3AOnlineBFME1_Patch1.06_AIO.exe
- hdmod:
    filename: hd.exe
    referer: https://duckduckgo.com
    url: https://www.moddb.com/downloads/mirror/127233/112/249735ed278c725f969e979f94bb72f3/
game:
  arch: win32
  args: -mod "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Application Data/My Battle for Middle-earth
    Files/HDEditionv1.0.big"
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/EA GAMES/The Battle for Middle-earth (tm)/lotrbfme.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  version: lutris-4.13-x86_64
  wine: null
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Run Installer
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing official patch version 1.03
    executable: patch103
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing patch 1.06
    executable: patch106
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing hd mod
    executable: hdmod
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Setting OS as Windows XP.
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp
